meanings.sent1: I enjoy grilling wurst on the barbecue during summer.
meanings.sent2: The market had a variety of wurst for sale, including bratwurst and kielbasa.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the wurst disappeared the fastest, everyone loved it!
meanings.sent4: The wurst was like a flavorful link of happiness on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling wurst filled the air, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The most inferior or least desirable part or aspect of something
meanings.sent1: She always picks the wurst piece of cake, the one with the least frosting.
meanings.sent2: The team knew they had to improve the wurst of their performance to win.
meanings.sent3: Even the wurst day can be turned around with a positive attitude.
meanings.sent4: His attitude towards the project was the wurst, dragging everyone down.
meanings.sent5: The wurst of the storm hit just as we were about to leave, soaking us completely.
